title: FS:  Addie Joss Portrait SGC 30/2 (Sharp!) P350
author: SetBuilder

posts.post_title: FS:  Addie Joss Portrait SGC 30/2 (Sharp!) P350
posts.post_content:
For sale is a great looking Addie Joss Piedmont 350 portrait.  The card features sharp corners and perfect centering.  Unfortunately, the grade seems to have dropped due to tiny specs of paper loss on the back (see image).  

Priced very reasonably at SOLD delivered.  Payment through PayPal.  Fee covered by buyer.


[URL=http://s1349.photobucket.com/user/setbuilder1/media/Joss1_zps336a033b.jpg.html][IMG]http://i1349.photobucket.com/albums/p759/setbuilder1/Joss1_zps336a033b.jpg[/IMG][/URL]
